bosses.name: Vorgath, the Pyreblight Colossus
bosses.short_description: A colossal fire-corrupted titan born from a cursed mountain guardian.
bosses.large_description: Vorgath was once the guardian spirit of a mighty mountain chain until an ancient curse from a fallen fire deity twisted it into a vessel of ruin. Now it wanders volcanic wastelands, driven only by rage and a need to purify the world in molten decay.

minions.name: Emberlash Hounds
minions.description: Former mountain wolves reshaped into flaming horrors by Vorgath’s corrupted aura.

minions.name: Pyreborne Imps
minions.description: Fissure-dwelling elementals who worship Vorgath as a living volcano-god.

bosses.name: Thornmaul, the Verdant Warden
bosses.short_description: An ancient stone guardian awakened only when nature itself is threatened.
bosses.large_description: Carved from ancient cliffs and blessed by the Worldtree, Thornmaul is the last remaining sentinel of an era where nature ruled unchallenged. It awakens only when balance is disturbed, defending its domain with patience and overwhelming force.
weakness: Sluggish when its roots are cut

minions.name: Glimmerroot Spritelings
minions.description: Mischievous saplings animated by Thornmaul’s life force.

minions.name: Barkhorn Stags
minions.description: Forest guardians who willingly serve Thornmaul as protectors of sacred grounds.

bosses.name: Krakos, the Abyssal Terror
bosses.short_description: A corrupted ocean deity remnant that rises from tectonic rifts.
bosses.large_description: Krakos is the final remnant of an ancient ocean deity drowned in its own corruption. It emerges when tectonic rifts tear open beneath the sea, feeding on drowned memories, cursed relics, and any creature foolish enough to drift near its abyssal vortex.

minions.name: Abyssspawn Eels
minions.description: Twisted sea serpents birthed in Krakos’ swirling whirlpools.

minions.name: Drowned Myrmidons
weakness: Light magic dissolves their cursed shells
minions.description: Souls of ancient warriors bound eternally to Krakos' abyssal hunger.

bosses.name: Xyralon, the Riftshard Abomination
bosses.short_description: An unstable crystal anomaly born from a cosmic rift.
bosses.large_description: Forged where a cosmic rift bled into a crystal nexus, Xyralon is not alive by mortal understanding. It is an anomaly, an unstable consciousness echoing across fractured dimensions. Its mere presence warps the sky and destabilizes reality around it.
weakness: Overloads when hit with harmonic magic

minions.name: Riftlings
minions.description: Glitches of reality spawned from Xyralon’s fractured dimensional presence.

minions.name: Prismcarvers
weakness: Brittle bodies shatter under concussive force
minions.description: Semi-sentient constructs that sculpt crystal fields according to Xyralon’s strange patterns.
